title: 93 61 1 "Boogie Powder""Off to the Desert Kingdom! The Rain-Summoning Powder and the Rebel Army!"Transliteration: "Iza sabaku no kuni e! Ame o yobu kona to hanrangun" (Japanese:いざ砂漠の国へ!雨を呼ぶ粉と反乱軍) Kōnosuke Uda Junki Takegami December 16, 2001(2001-12-16)[6] February 25, 2006[7]
transformers_text: 93 61 1 Boogie Powder Off to the Desert Kingdom The Rain Summoning Powder and the Rebel Army Transliteration Iz a s a baku no kuni e A me o yo bu kona to han ran gun Japanese K no suke Uda Junk i Take gam i December 16 2001 2001 12 16 6 February 25 2006 7 Luffy separates from the rest of the crew to find food right after arriving at A la bast a's port city of Nan ohana The crew dons disguises while Luffy learns of Dance Powder
